title: GAMIN МИКРОФОН HYPERX DUOCAST - USB MICROPHONE - RGB LIGHTING BLACK HMID1R-A-BK/G
description:
Color: Black
Total Harmonic Distortion: ≤ 0.05% (1kHz/0dBFS)
Light Effects: 2 zones
Noise (RMS) (Headphone): ≤-110dBFS
Noise (RMS) (Microphone): ≤-70dBFS
Connection Type: USB-C, 3.5mm headphone output
Cable length: 2m
Element: Two electret condenser capsules
Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20kHz
Sampling Rates: 96kHz, 48kHz, 44.1kHz
Sensitivity - Microphone: '-6dBFS (1V/Pa at 1kHz)
USB: USB 2.0 (full speed)
Polar Pattern: Cardioid, omnidirectional
Power Consumption: 5V 200mA
Compatibility: PC, PS5™, PS4™, Mac®
